text: OŠK Slovenský Grob is a Slovak football team, based in the town of Slovenský Grob. The club was founded in 1932. ==Notable players== The following players had international caps for their respective countries. Players whose name is listed in bold represented their countries while playing for Slovenský Grob. :Past (and present) players who are the subjects of Wikipedia articles can be found here. * Siradji Sani ==References== == External links == *at futbalvregione.sk Slovensky Grob Category:Sport in Bratislava Region Category:1932 establishments in Czechoslovakia Category:Association football clubs established in 1932
title: OŠK Slovenský Grob
